title: Add dance style dropdown on main screen

requirements.text: Add a dropdown input on the appâ€™s main screen that lets the user select a dance style from: "Bollywood", "Classical", "Semi-classical", and "Indo Fusion". Display a clear label above the dropdown in English (e.g., "Dance style") and show the currently selected value on the screen (e.g., as helper text below the dropdown).

quotes: Enter dance stykes such as bollywood,classical,semi classical,indo fusion

acceptanceCriteria: The main screen renders a labeled dropdown control.
The dropdown contains exactly these options: Bollywood, Classical, Semi-classical, Indo Fusion.
Selecting an option updates the UI to reflect the current selection.
All user-facing text for this feature is in English.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, creative visual theme for the main screen (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently for the dropdown section without introducing new product features.
acceptanceCriteria: The main screen has a consistent visual style (background, typography, spacing).
The dropdown section looks intentionally designed and consistent with the theme.
No new functionality beyond styling/layout is introduced by this requirement.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources must be composed, not edited).
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding additional dance styles beyond: Bollywood, Classical, Semi-classical, Indo Fusion.
Persisting the selected dance style to the backend or across reloads.
Adding authentication changes (sign-in is out of scope for this request).
